title: Gnar Christmas skin
body: Can we have a gnar skin where he is the gingerbread man? Have his boomerang either be a candy cane or a broken piece of ginger bread. Then have mega gnar turn into a bigger goofy gingerbread man. Think like the stay puff marshmallow man for lol.

replies.body:
This is a pretty neat idea! I encourage you to post it on the [*Concepts & Creations Boards*](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts), where it will get far more visibility and discussion.

Let me know if you have any questions.
